column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I got the 42 day dry aged ribeye cooked medium rare
column3: it was one of the worst "nice" steaks I've eaten. It came out pretty much rare and I knew if they put it back on
column4: all the flavor and juice would be lost. It was super dark in the basement and the service was far from exceptional. It was overall
column5: an average steakhouse in my opinion.
